snippet: Outlays for digital journalism and severance costs cut into profit for 2014, but digital ad revenue rose 19 percent in the quarter compared with last year.
abstract: New York Times Co reports 2014 operating profit of $92 million, down from $156 million in 2013; cites costs related to investment in digital journalism and job reductions.
lead_paragraph: Outlays for digital journalism and severance costs cut into profit for 2014, but digital ad revenue rose 19 percent in the quarter compared with last year.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Profit Falls Despite Strides in Digital Ads
headline.print_headline: New York Times Co. Profit Falls Despite Strides in Digital Ads
